title.en: Uchi no Hentai Maid ni Osowareteru

altTitles.en: My Hentai Maid is Assaulting Me
My Perverted Maid is Attacking Me

altTitles.ja: うちの変態メイドに襲われてる

description.en: Spring has come. I, Haruto, am now a university student, and I'm living on my own in an apartment.However, my father suddenly sent me a "maid" because he was worried about me. This maid is a huge pervert with a dirty mind who spends every day assaulting me with her provocative behavior.
description.fr: Le printemps est arrivé. Moi, Haruto, est maintenant étudiant à l'université et je vis seul dans un appartement. Cependant, mon père m'a soudainement envoyé une "bonne" parce qu'il s'inquiétait pour moi. Cette bonne est une énorme perverse à l'esprit sale qui passe tous ses jours à m'agresser avec son comportement provocateur.
description.zh: 我家女仆是个变态，她会在我睡懒觉时候给我个早安咬叫我起床！

description.en:
Do you know what a shaman is?　It's said that they have the mysterious ability to connect this world with the other world and communicate with gods, spirits, and spirits of the dead. The third generation shaman, Anna, a.k.a. Aluminum Nium Birch, is searching for a super class spirit to win the proxy war of the gods. The story intersects as the beautiful stars gather in Nagano, followed by Aluminum, Death Zero, and Hana.

___
*Continuing after the events of Shaman King Flowers, the group of "Super Stars" will join together and spin together a new legend…*
  
**Officially licensed:**  
- In Taiwan by [Tongli](https://www.tongli.com.tw/BooksDetail.aspx?Bd=KD1554001) as "通靈童子THE SUPER STAR"  
- In Thailand by Siam Inter Comics
description.ja: シャーマンって知ってる！？　この世とあの世を結んで、神・精霊・死者の霊なんかと交流できる不思議な能力をもった人らしい。そんなシャーマンの三代目イタコのアンナことアルミ・ニウムバーチが探すのは、神々の代理戦争を勝つための超級霊だった。長野に集う綺羅星達は、アルミ、デスゼロ、花と続き、物語は交錯していく。
description.es-la:
¿Sabes lo que es un chamán?　Parece ser una persona que tiene la misteriosa capacidad de conectar este mundo con el otro y comunicarse con dioses, espíritus y espíritus de los muertos. La tercera generación de chamanes, Anna, alias Alum Nium Birch, busca un espíritu sobrenatural que le ayude a ganar la guerra de los dioses. La historia continúa con la reunión de las estrellas en Nagano y la interacción de Almi, Death Zero y Hana.
___
*Continuando después de los eventos de Shaman King Flowers, el grupo de "Superestrellas" se unirá e hilará una nueva leyenda...*

altTitles.ja: アイドルマスター シンデレラガールズ U149

description.en:
U149, also known as "Under149", is a spinoff story of Cinderella Girls encompassing the younger idols, who are under 149 cm, and their pursuits to be big time idols with their newly hired P-san.  
  
Part of [THE iDOLM@STER](https://mangadex.org/search?q=iDOLM%40STER) series.

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム エンゲージ
Over Drive Girls
超可動ガールズ

description.en:
Translated from Amazon.com.jp using google translate.

The latest work in the "Super Movable Girl" series, in which a moving beautiful girl figure rushes in and becomes a wife. A romantic comedy in which tiny cute [super movable girls] such as the girl-type planet explorer Nona, the RPG hero Bernoa, and the 2D fighting game character Subaru are involved in the otaku boy Haruto. If there is love, what is the size difference!?

altTitles.ja: メイドの岸さん

description.en: Kiichiro Hayase has a reputation as the wealthiest, hottest, most eligible bachelor in town. But as they say...behind every successful man is the maid who keeps him from tripping over his own two feet! Enter Miss Kishi, the most competent, professional maid around—and the only thing keeping from Kiichiro quite literally crashing and burning. He owes it all to her, but can he ever make it up to her? He's sworn to try... no matter how many things must get broken, scattered, or lost to do so!
description.pt: Uma comédia romântica sobre um mestre desajeitado que quer fazer sua calma empregada feliz. Hayase Kiichirou vem de uma importante família. Como próximo sucessor, todas as empresas da família serão dele. Ele é a elite da elite. Contudo, sua única fraqueza é o fato de ser desajeitado, assim, Kishi-san, sua empregada, é aquela que sempre da um jeito nas coisas pra ele. Apesar de ter sempre a mesma expressão, Kiichirou está determinado a fazê-la feliz, independente da situação.

title.en: Otomege Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới Otomegame Thật Khắc Nghiệt Với Nhân Vật Quần Chúng

altTitles.th: ชีวิตตัวประกอบอย่างตูช่างอยู่ยากเมื่ออยู่ในโลกเกมจีบหนุ่ม

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲー世界はモブに厳しい世界です

altTitles.ko: 여성향 게임 세계는 엑스트라에게 어려운 세상입니다

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu

altTitles.ru: Мир отомэ-игр — это тяжёлый мир для мобов

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Dating Sim: The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs

altTitles.fr: Mon Destin... Entre Les Mains Des Femmes

altTitles.zh-hk: 女性向遊戲世界對路人角色很不友好

altTitles.en: The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs

description.en: Leon, a former Japanese worker, was reincarnated into an “otome game” world, and despaired at how it was a world where females hold dominance over males. It was as if men were just livestock that served as stepping stones for females in this world. The only exceptions were the game’s romantic targets, a group of handsome men led by the crown prince. In these bizarre circumstances, Leon held one weapon: his knowledge from his previous world, where his brazen sister had forced him to complete this game. This is a story about his adventure to survive and thrive in this world.
description.ja:
転生したら「女尊男卑」な、乙女ゲー世界でした!!!

モブからだって成り上がれ！
イケメン死すべし！
剣と魔法の異世界ファンタジー!!!

▼
剣と魔法の“乙女ゲー"の世界に転生した、
元日本の社会人だったリオンは、その女尊男卑な世界に絶望する。

この世界では、男なぞは女性を養うだけの家畜のようなものであった。
例外なのは、ゲームで攻略対象であった王太子率いるイケメン軍団ぐらいである。

そんな理不尽な境遇において、リオンはある一つの武器を持っていた。
前世で生意気な妹に無理矢理攻略させられていたこのゲームの知識である。

本当は田舎に引きこもりのんびりとしたいリオンだったが
その知識を使い、やりたい放題の女どもとイケメンに、はからずも反旗を翻すのだった。
ド外道主人公による、爽快(?)下克上ファンタジー、コミカライズでも開演!

(Source: コミックウォーカー)
description.pt-br: Leon, um ex-trabalhador japonês, reencarnou em um mundo de “otome game” e se desesperou com a forma como era um mundo onde as mulheres detêm o domínio sobre os homens. Era como se os homens fossem apenas animais que serviram como degraus para as fêmeas neste mundo. As únicas exceções eram os alvos românticos do jogo, um grupo de homens bonitos liderados pelo príncipe herdeiro. Nestas circunstâncias bizarras, Leon tem apenas uma arma: seu conhecimento do seu mundo anterior, que ele obteve após completar o jogo, depois de ser forçado por sua irmã a jogá-lo. Leon, que realmente só quer viver tranquilamente na periferia do país, usa seu conhecimento para bater de frente contra as mulheres e esses homens bonitos.

title.en: Game-nai Saikyou no "Ura Boss" ni Tensei shita no de, Shujinkou no Kawarini Saisoku Clear wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: ゲーム内最強の『裏ボス』に転生したので､主人公の代わりに最速クリアを目指します!

description.ja:
「裏ボスに転生！？俺、留年しちまうぞぉおおおお！！」

廃人ゲーマーの俺は、ある日やり込んでいたゲームの裏ボスに転生してしまった。現実世界への帰還のために最速クリアを目指すが…何一つ思い通りにいかない！？

ゲームの主人公はどこ！？
モブNPCが勇者になってしまった！？
悪役令嬢が俺のパーティーになってしまったんですけど！？

title.en: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game

altTitles.en: Haibara-kun's Strong and Youthful New Game

altTitles.ja: 灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム

altTitles.ja-ro: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game

description.en:
Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!

Natsuki is given the opportunity to “redo” his regret-filled high school life, and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!

What’s more, the beautiful girl he once had a crush on, Hikari, was also there…?!

The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life, a strong, new game school romantic comedy!
description.ja:
大人気作品『灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム』のコミカライズ連載スタート！

高校デビューに失敗し、灰色の高校時代を経て大学４年となった青年・灰原夏希。社会人目前だった彼はある日突然、７年前――高校入学直前まで時を遡っていた!!
後悔しかなかった高校生活の「やり直し」の機会を得た夏希は、過去の経験を活かして見事クラスカースト最上位な美男美女６人グループの一員となることに成功！
しかもそこにはかつて片思いしていた美少女・陽花里の姿もあって……!?
無自覚ハイスペック青年が２度目の青春をリアルにやり直す、強くてニューゲーム学園ラブコメ！

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Sa isang partikular na paaralan ay may isang natatanging klab at ang tatlong tagapamahala nito. Bagama't hindi kapansin-pansin, ay nagsimula na ang mga araw na kahit saan ay hindi matatagpuan! Iginuhit ni Souichiro Yamamoto, ay isang bagong kuwento ng mga kabataan sa larangan ng isports!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.ja: シーザス
復活殺手JESUS

description.en:
The underground speaks of hitman of incredible skill, this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? because that happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

altTitles.ja: ちはるくんは女装をしたくない

description.en:
Follow Chiharu, a boy who doesn't want to crossdress!
It's a romantic comedy featuring a bunch of youngsters!

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.ja: ヤマメの旧地獄ガイダンス

altTitles.de: Yamames Führung durch die Alte Hölle

description.de:
Yamame gibt Clownpiece eine Tour durch die alte Hölle.
Ursprünglich auf der Comiket 95 herausgebracht.
description.ja:
ヤマメがクラピを導いてあげる話。
C95にて発行

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 4 「Let's Save the Royal Academy Library!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

altTitles.ja: Lord El-Melloi II Case Files
ロード・エルメロイⅡ世の事件簿

altTitles.vi: Bí ẩn trong thế giới ma thuật

description.en:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
description.ru: Часовая Башня — центр магического мира и штаб-квартира «Ассоциации магов», хранящей секреты бесценных таинств. Преподающий здесь лорд факультета современной магии, Эль-Меллой II, по стечению определённых обстоятельств оказывается втянут в борьбу за наследие Замка Разделения, Адра. Только разгадавший тайну ангельских имён, что были даны всем приглашённым и встречаются в нём повсюду, сможет получить его «наследие». Однако даже для высокопоставленных магов Часовой Башни это дело оказалось не простым решением головоломки, а началом волшебного, но в то же время печального инцидента.С этого дела началось досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II, в котором переплелись магия и таинства, иллюзии и загадки...

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Sora, a Japanese boy who was summoned to another world, gained the skill "Walking." Its effect is that "no matter how much he walks, he never gets tired." Because of this weak skill, the king expelled him from the group of summoned heroes. But when Sora starts walking in another world, he suddenly levels up!
 
Walking had a hidden effect of "gaining 1 EXP for each step taken." He acquired useful skills such as 'Appraisal,' 'Alchemy,' and healing magic...

Getting one skill after another, he became talented just by walking! The adventure to encounter and touch the unknown is about to begin!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

title.en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~ Futari No Jikan, Iiwake No Gozen'en

altTitles.en: A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week ~ 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together

altTitles.ko: 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~

description.en:
Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai’s time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. 

Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi’s orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school… 

Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
description.es-la: Una vez a la semana, Miyagi paga 5.000 yenes a su compañera de clase Sendai.Los 5.000 yenes son para comprar tres horas de tiempo de Sendai, lo que da derecho a Miyagi a darle órdenes.Miyagi está en la parte baja de la casta escolar mientras que Sendai está en la alta. Las dos, que nunca se han cruzado en la escuela, pasan tiempo juntas después de clase bajo este contrato.Las órdenes de Miyagi vienen determinadas por su estado de ánimo del día, y Sendai no puede desobedecerlas.Un día después de clase... Miyagi llama a Sendai a su habitación y le da una orden que no suele dar.

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

title.en: I Want to Enjoy Slow Living

altTitles.en: I want a slow life in the countryside after reincarnation

altTitles.ja: 転生して田舎でスローライフをおくりたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生之後我想要在田園過慢生活

altTitles.ru: После перерождения я хочу жить спокойной жизнью в деревне

altTitles.zh: 转生之后我想要在田园过慢生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei shite Inaka de Slow Life wo Okuritai
Tensei Shite Inaka de Slowlife wo Okuritai

description.en:
The protagonist, Inaka Yuuji, was ran over by a truck because his awareness was dulled from overworking.  
  
“Ahー, with this I don’t have to work so much anymore. I want to spend my next life leisurely……” was the wish Yuuji blurted out, He met God and it was decided he will be reincarnated in the countryside of the other world. He became Alfred Slowlet, 2nd son of a countryside noble, will he be able to enjoy and leisurely spend his slow life in the countryside?

title.en: Gate 0: Jieitai Ginzai Nite Kaku Tatakaeri

altTitles.ru: Врата 0: Сражение Сил самообороны в Гинзе.

altTitles.ja: ゲート0 -ZERO- 自衛隊 銀座にて、斯く戦えり

description.en: In the summer of 20XX, a ``gate to another world'' suddenly appeared in Ginza, Tokyo. What came pouring in from inside was a mysterious army and a group of hideous monsters. They go around slaughtering people, and Ginza in broad daylight quickly turns into a hellscape. While everyone was helplessly thrown into confusion in this state of emergency, there was one man who was brave enough to move around. That man was Yohji Itami, an otaku Self-Defense Force officer who would later be called the "Hero of Nijubashi"!
description.ru: Летом 20ХХ года в Гинзе, квартале Токио, внезапно появились «Врата в иной мир». Из них разразились таинственная армия и полчища диковинных уродливых монстров. Они нахлынули и устроили бойню, и Гинза средь бела дня мгновенно обратилась адом. И пока в панике все растерянно метались посреди этой чрезвычайной ситуации, лишь одному мужчине хватило храбрости действовать. Им оказался Итами Йоджи, отаку из Сил самообороны, которого впоследствии назовут «Героем Нидзюбаси»! Безумно популярная серия фэнтези «Другой мир против Сил самообороны», история появления врат, «Инцидент в Гинзе», теперь в формате манги!!!

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
なおざりダンジョン

description.en: Just four years ago, Rustica Genas was the most gifted knight in the Caleta Empire and one of the emperor's most trusted servants. But after challenging his will one too many times, all of her fame, glory, and power were stripped from her. Then what can poor Rustica do but shamefully fade into obscurity? Well, when the rival empire's ruler sets his sights on winning her heart and freedom, she might have a chance to reclaim more than just her reputation. What could be waiting for her just beyond the Great Barrier?

altTitles.ja: μ&i
μ&i みゅうあんどあい

description.en:
After the meteorite “Artemis” crashed into the moon, an unidentified phenomenon began to affect humans: the “Reproductive System Disease”.

12 years have passed, and in a world with a birth rate of 0, humanity has focused its collective efforts on researching cloning and immortality. Amidst this, Ashiro Koshiro continues to search for the cause of the disease. Suddenly, a woman appears, handing him a mysterious suitcase…
description.ja: 月の崩壊により繁殖機能を失った人類が暮らす、西暦20X7年──。大学生の孝志郎は、思わぬ出来事から記憶喪失の少女・みゅうを預かることに。ごく普通に見える彼女だが、人類で唯一繁殖機能を有する突然変異だった！

title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.pt-br: O cara de que estou a fim não era um cara?!

altTitles.uk: Хлопець, який її цікавив, взагалі не був хлопцем

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.az: Onun maraqlandığı oğlan əslində heç oğlan deyilmiş

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.id: Pria Yang Dia Suka Ternyata Sama Sekali Bukan Pria

altTitles.th: คนที่เธอปิ๊งความจริงไม่ใช่ผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: ＭＡＩＤｅｓ─メイデス─メイド、地獄の戦場に転送される。固有のゴミ収集魔法で、最弱クラスのまま人類最強に。@COMIC

description.en:
"……W-what should I do? I’m being transported to the battlefield of hell!"

In the midst of the war against the demonic beasts, where humanity faces the threat of extinction, the maid girl Orsela accidentally finds herself transferred to a forest on the front lines of the battlefield. She has no weapons or combat experience; all she possesses is her seemingly useless inherent magic, which can only summon things that people no longer need.

When she encounters a large magical beast—a dragon—and finds herself in a desperate, life-threatening situation, she gambles everything and summons a magical weapon: a revolver, and a battle-crazed girl of heroic class!?

The magic that was thought to be useless turns out to be more suited for battle than any other magic...

Before she knows it, she becomes the last bastion protecting humanity!

The weakest class maid carves out a future for mankind!
A survival fantasy of rising to the top in a world on the brink of collapse begins!

Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

description.en:
"You’re its prey the moment you touch it." 

One day, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

description.en:
Entertainment writer Lee Seul, heard the news of her favorite idol, Block Shoot's Seung-Chan, on her new entertainment program.
Expectations of meeting her favorite for more than 10 years are brief, and she accidentally sees her favorite idol kissing someone else in secret at the broadcasting station.
In addition, the entertainment program she was in charge of is a love variety program that’s full of dating amongst the cast...
She has to watch her favorite idol flirting and dating someone else even if he's her favorite.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

title.en: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke

altTitles.en: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.
The story of a generation filled with romance and chaos.

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: 7th Time Loop: The Villainess Enjoys a Carefree Life Married to Her Worst Enemy!

altTitles.ja: ループ7回目の悪役令嬢は、元敵国で自由気ままな花嫁（人質）生活を満喫する
ループ7回目の悪役令嬢は、元敵国で自由気ままな花嫁生活を満喫する

altTitles.ja-ro: Loop 7-kai me no Akuyaku Reijou wa, Moto Tekikoku de Jiyuu Kimamana Hanayome Seikatsu wo Mankitsu Suru
Rūpu 7-kai-me no Akuyaku Reijō wa, Moto Tekikoku de Jiyū Kimamana Hanayome (Hitojichi) Seikatsu o Mankitsu suru
Rūpu 7-kai-me no Akuyaku Reijō wa, Moto Tekikoku de Jiyū Kimamana Hanayome Seikatsu o Mankitsu suru

altTitles.en: The Villain Daughter Enjoys Her Seventh Life as a Free-Spirited Bride (Hostage) in a Former Enemy Country
The Villainess Wants to Enjoy a Carefree Married Life in a Former Enemy Country in Her Seventh Loop!

altTitles.zh: 轮回七次的恶役千金，在前敌国享受随心所欲的新婚生活

altTitles.zh-hk: 輪回七次的惡役千金，在前敵國享受隨心所欲的新婚生活

altTitles.vi: Nữ Phụ Phản Diện Ở Kiếp Thứ 7 Muốn Tận Hưởng Cuộc Sống Hôn Nhân Ở Địch Quốc

altTitles.th: ชีวิตลูปที่ 7 ของนางร้าย ขอเป็นเจ้าสาวนอนกลิ้งสบายในแดนอดีตศัตรู

altTitles.ko: 루프 7회차 악역 영애는 적국에서 자유로운 신부 생활을 만끽한다

description.en:
Rishe, the daughter of a duke, is stuck in a time loop that begins at the moment her engagement is annulled and ends with her early demise at the age of 20. She has now begun her seventh loop.  
  
In her past do-overs, Rishe experienced various occupations, including being a merchant, a pharmacist, and a knight. But this time around, she simply wishes to live a long and leisurely life!  
  
That *was* the plan, only for it to be derailed by an unprecedented marriage proposal from her killer in the previous loop, the neighbouring country's Crown Prince—?!  


---

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1784ga/)
description.id: Rishe, seorang putri dari bangsawan, terjebak dalam putaran waktu yang dimulai sesaat setelah pertunangannya dibatalkan, dan berakhir saat kematiannya di awal usia 20 tahun. sekarang dirinya memulai putaran waktu yang ke tujuh kalinya. Di kehidupan sebelumnya, Rishe menjalani berbagai macam pekerjaan, termasuk bekerja menjadi pedagang, apoteker, dan seorang kesatria. Tetapi pada kali ini, dia hanya mengharapkan kehidupan panjang dan waktu yang luang! Itu adalah rencananya, hanya untuk tergelincir dalam tunangan yang belum pernah terjadi dari seseorang yang membunuhnya pada putaran waktu yang sebelumnya, Putra mahkota dari negeri tetangga-?!
description.ja:
公爵令嬢リーシェの人生には大きな秘密があった――。 
それは“20歳で命を落としては婚約破棄の瞬間に戻ってしまう”こと。 

これまで商人や薬師、侍女などそれぞれで充実した時間を満喫したが７回目の今度の人生は、違った決意に満ちていた。 

「今度こそ長生きをしてゴロゴロした生活を送りたい！」 

だが、実行に移すべく城を飛び出そうとした矢先、皇国ガルクハインの皇太子アルノルトと邂逅を果たす。 

彼こそ“騎士”だった前世でリーシェを殺害した張本人だった！ 
さらに、妙に気に入られ結婚まで申し込まれてしまい――!? 
ゴロゴロしたい決意とは裏腹に、波瀾万丈な７回目の人生が始まる。

altTitles.en: First of All, Let's Hide My Younger Brother
First Let's Hide My Younger Brother
Let's Hide My Younger Brother First

altTitles.ja: 弟は今留守番中です

description.en:
I've possessed a character in an R-rated BL manhwa. It's in a world where people, whose craziness ranges from one to ten, appear.

"Franz, can you take off your clothes for a moment?"

"Sister? Wh-why my clothes?"

Their crazy serenade had already begun. Having been faced with the violence my younger brother had to endure, I made a vow.

"Instead of Franz, I'll have *Schuette* instead."

Those people are coming soon. The people who will exterminate my family, and when that's not enough, they'll devour my younger brother's innocence.

"And I'll become a knight to succeed our family and carry on its legacy."

If he doesn't go, I'll die! That's how I thoroughly hid my brother and decided attend all the official events myself. …But something's wrong.

"I do! I love Kyla Vesta!"

"If Young Miss gets hurt, then I'll…"

"I don't feel the need to wait any longer."

Didn't you all like men? Why are you all suddenly obsessed with me?

---
The fate of a girl in a BL novel is a tragic one. Girls are either vaguely helpful, evil, or add nothing to the plot. So what happens when you turn into the older sister of a BL novel protagonist? The older sister who dies a tragic death at the hands of a madman who’s infatuated with your younger brother? You go with your gut instinct: hide him. Hide your brother from everything, especially men, that could harm him and you. That’s the task that Kyla Vesta is set with in this life, and a task that she’s determined to complete.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EC%84%A0-%EB%82%A8%EB%8F%99%EC%83%9D%EB%B6%80%ED%84%B0-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EC%9E%90/2649), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57492806)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/hide_brother)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9813/)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000164)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.fizzo.org/page/share/?bid=7838953455539453182&isNew=1&from=copy_link&group=2&d=5769532665904477950&language=id&region=ID)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74283)
description.zh:
穿越到自己读过的纯爱小说里，成为了主角的姐姐！偏执狂男主的第一牺牲者竟然是我… 为了活命首先把弟弟藏起来，代替他成为骑士，可是为什么男主不按常理出牌突然开始纠缠我？！

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EC%84%A0-%EB%82%A8%EB%8F%99%EC%83%9D%EB%B6%80%ED%84%B0-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EC%9E%90/2649), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57492806)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74283)

altTitles.ja: ガンダムエグザ　ブイエス
ガンダムEXAVS

description.en:
Gundam EXA VS (ガンダム EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

altTitles.ja: 恋愛の授業

description.en: In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...? A love-learning romantic comedy between a beautiful JK girl and a boy.

title.en: Kami-sama ga Koi wo shiro to Itte iru!

altTitles.en: God is Telling Me to Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: 神様が恋をしろと言っている！

altTitles.zh-hk: 神明大人对我说快去恋爱吧

description.en: Chiyoko, in her second year of high school, transfers to a co-ed school due to her dad's job transfer. Since she's only attended an all-girls school since junior high, she excitedly plans to fall in love in her new school. Out of the blue, she begins to see the love meters of 5 hotties and an options window as if she were in an otome game?! She encounters various types such as a glasses boy, a playboy underclassman, and a mysterious senior. Meet-cutes with boys come one after another. This is the beginning of a real otome game school life!

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amou, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amou sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ
Satanofani

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.en: Beware of the Vicious Dog Inside!

altTitles.zh-ro: Nei You E Quan Qing Xiao Xin

description.en:
By some sort of fate, exorcist Xiao Yu is forced to "cohabitate" with the succubus named Obsidian, who killed her adoptive father. Yet she discovers that the succubus seems to have lost her memories! Unaccepting of this fact, Xiao Yu decides to spy on Obsidian's every move, yet the latter doesn't seem bothered by the least. Instead, she starts to thirst after Xiao Yu openly and often teases her body to satiate her own hunger...

Although they seem to have a love-hate relationship, they both know that something is stirring beneath the depths. Why her adoptive father was killed, why Obsidian's memory was sealed away, and...

altTitles.ja: 黒ギャルさんが来る！

description.en:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?
description.es-la: Un oficinista asediado encuentra su camino a un café donde denuncia las dificultades de su rutina. Allí, una amable estudiante de secundaria gyaru se da cuenta de sus lamentos y después de oírle desahogarse, le anima a la manera de "gyaru" e intercambian contactos. ¿Qué será de esta improbable amistad?

title.en: The Cup of Vengeance Is in Your Hands

description.en: Princess Eudith’s story begins when her cruel brother, the king, sells her off to the neighboring kingdom to marry the queen’s powerless stepson, Prince Franz. Eudith becomes a pawn in the queen’s plot to discredit Franz and place her biological son, Krald, on the throne. Desperate, Eudith attempts to end her misery but wakes up on the day of her fateful journey. Armed with knowledge and experience from her past life, Eudith seizes the chance for revenge by helping Prince Franz take his rightful place on the throne. Will Eudith succeed in her revenge and find happiness?
